snippet: New claims for unemployment benefits fell more than expected recently, and retail executives and analysts forecast improved same-store sales in April.
abstract: Stocks rise for fourth straight day, sending Dow Jones industrial average and Standard & Poor's 500-stock index to new milestones as positive data on labor market and encouraging retail outlook ease concerns about economic growth.
lead_paragraph: New claims for unemployment benefits fell more than expected recently, and retail executives and analysts forecast improved same-store sales in April.

headline.main: Market Climbs Higher as Jobless Claims Slip
headline.print_headline: Market Climbs Higher as Jobless Claims Slip
